document_data.mainbody:
haolas Wineshop was a wine shop in Leuthilspar on the island of Evermeet.
Thaolas shop was located east of Dhoelaths Tower and north of the Shrine of the Black Sword.
The shop was owned by Thaola who sold vintage elven wines. 
Around 1367 DR, Thaola had a single bottle of wine from Myth Drannor.
